description: Mystery Castle is an interactive story where players explore the castle with Alexa.  There is something magical and mysterious about this castle with its beautiful rooms and intriguing puzzles.  Explore and unlock the mystery by issuing simple commands to Alexa such as "look around the room", "move north", and "pick up the key".  Mystery Castle is an imaginative game suitable for all ages.
name: Mystery Castle
shortDescription: Explore a mysterious castle, collecting items and solving puzzles.
